metadata.title: CVE-2021-47580 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:scsi_debug: Fix type in min_t to avoid stack OOB Change min_t() to use type"u32" instead of type "int" to avoid stack out of bounds. With min_t() type"int" the values get sign extended and the larger value gets used causingstack out of bounds.
